calendar.title: Calendar
description: This work was completed while staffed on Slack's Zero to One product team as a product design lead. From 2024 to 2025, our team worked to design a native Calendar experience in Slack. Calendar aims to integrate all your tools & data into a single, unified layer that allows you to manage all the things competing for your time, right in Slack. I contributed several elements of the visual design, and led design strategy to create an overall vision for the project. We wanted the experience to feel powerful, and playful â€” true to Slack's personality and product value. This work is currently in progress, and set to GA next year.
calendar.credits: Many thanks to Samuel Kang, Amanda Glanz, Timothy Wittig, Ford St. John, Elyse Vest, Parag Shah, Stewart Taylor, and Stuart Lovinggood for their talent and time.

template-test.title: Template Test Project
description: This is a test project to verify that our template system works correctly. It demonstrates that you can create new projects by simply copying the template and updating the project data.
template-test.credits: Template system test - no actual credits needed.

lists.title: Lists
description: A comprehensive list management system designed to help users organize tasks, ideas, and information efficiently. This project explores intuitive interfaces for creating, organizing, and managing various types of lists with smart categorization and search capabilities.
lists.credits: Lists project - showcasing list management and organization interfaces.

huddles.title: Huddles
description: Huddles project - a collaborative workspace solution designed to enhance team communication and project coordination. This project explores innovative approaches to remote collaboration, real-time communication, and seamless team workflows.
huddles.credits: Huddles project - showcasing collaborative workspace and team communication interfaces.

client-redesign.title: Client Redesign
description: Client Redesign project - a comprehensive redesign initiative focused on improving user experience, visual design, and overall product functionality. This project demonstrates strategic design thinking and user-centered design approaches.
client-redesign.credits: Client Redesign project - showcasing strategic design improvements and user experience enhancements.

onboarding-system.title: Onboarding System
description: Onboarding System project - a comprehensive user onboarding experience designed to guide new users through complex products and services. This project explores intuitive user guidance, progressive disclosure, and seamless first-time user experiences.
onboarding-system.credits: Onboarding System project - showcasing user onboarding and guidance interfaces.
